name: Burn nut team 15
description:
PITCH

Burn nut is a running game where you play a little squirrel trying to escape from a burning tree. Climb as high as possible but be careful! Don’t hit any obstacles or the flames will get you !

FEATURES

. Avoid obstacles. 

. Pick up acorns for bonus points. 

. Climb as high as possible for maximum points.

CONTROLS

Use the arrows on your keyboard to move your squirrel from right to left. 

CREDITS

Game Artists : Florian Becavin - Yoav Bensadoun

Game Designers : Florian Boine - Alexandre Begis - Marcus Do Rego

Game Programmers : Florian Gozard - Florian Ribeiro - Pierre Mariotte 

Producing : Charlotte Litto
